overview: Stepdad walks in on his wife helping her daughter try on bras, but when mom leaves the room he can't control his desire any longer. Ava thought her stepdad had forgotten her birthday, but when gives her a see-thru leotard she rewards him by putting it on... and taking it off! A gift meant for his wife, ended up in Kadence's hands. When stepdad realizes the mistake he finds the vibrating gift deep inside her stepdaughter's pussy!
title: Ginger Patch 3
